es.gofio.mv6lib
Class Thread

java.lang.Object
  es.gofio.mv6lib.Thread

public class Thread
extends java.lang.Object

Thread
(1/Oct/09)

Example of usage:

Thread t = new Thread("http://www.mediavida.com/foro/8/spoilersois-unos-cansinosspoiler-364505");
System.out.println(t.getFavouritesCount());

Author:
Ricardo 'PiradoIV' Cruz Fdez., http://www.piradoiv.com/, piradoiv@gmail.com

Method Detail

getId

public java.lang.String getId()
Returns:
Returns the ID of the Thread.

getTimestamp

public long getTimestamp()
Returns:
Returns the timestamp (in milliseconds) of the thread's creation time.

getForumId

public int getForumId()
Returns:
Returns the ID of the parent forum.

getAuthor

public java.lang.String getAuthor()
Returns:
Get a Member class of the Author of the thread.

getTitle

public java.lang.String getTitle()
Returns:
Returns the title of the thread.

getRepliesCount

public int getRepliesCount()
Returns:
Returns the number of replies to the thread. Also is the id of the last post.

getFavouritesCount

public int getFavouritesCount()
Returns:
Returns the number of people who added this thread to their favourites.

getPageCount

public int getPageCount()
Returns:
Returns the number of pages of the thread.

getForumName

public java.lang.String getForumName()
Returns:
Returns the forum's name without the need of call the method Forum.getName()

refreshThread

public void refreshThread()
Forces the object to retrieve updated information of the thread.
